summary: FastPitchModel encapsulates the FastPitch architecture for converting textual input into mel‑spectrogram representations. It manages configuration, data loading, tokenization, normalization, training, validation, and inference pipelines, and provides utilities for model export and deployment.
business_intent: Enable rapid development and deployment of high‑quality text‑to‑speech systems by supplying a ready‑to‑train and ready‑to‑serve FastPitch model that generates mel spectrograms from text.
